h2_title: Stone Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
h3_title: Secret - Get Help from the Shigandang
content: In an alternative attack, he’ll slam down with both arm points straight up, meaning the detonation will cover a larger wide circle on all sides of him, instead of just a frontal cone. Again, you can use the Pillar Stance with enough lead time to heft yourself over the tremor and attack from above.
